override void Photon.Pun.Simple.SyncVitals.OnAwake ( )[virtual]
Be sure to use base.OnAwake() when overriding.
This is called when the NetObject runs Awake(). All code that depends on the NetObj being initialized should use this rather than Awake();

TryTrigger() TryTriggerPhoton.Pun.Simple.SyncVitals Photon.Pun.Simple.SyncVitalsTryTrigger
Consumption Photon.Pun.Simple.SyncVitals.TryTrigger (IContactReactor icontactReactor, ContactEvent contactEvent, int compatibleMounts)
First test to see if the contacting and contacted are a groups match - if not return false.
If both are set to 0 (Root) then consider that a match, otherwise zero for one but not the other is a mismatch (for now)
Apply changes resulting from the trigger. Return true if affected/consumed. This bool is used to inform whether the trigger should despawn/pickup.
Apply to vital if vital has authority.
Vital does not belong to us, but we want to know IF it would have been consumed for prediction purposes.
Implements Photon.Pun.Simple.IContactSystem.
